        public void attractToHoles(java.util.List<Hole> holes)

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore(boolean isCaptureSuccessful,
                        java.lang.String holeType)
        updates the score according to the level and score modifier, reduces the score when the capture is unsuccesful and increases the score when the capture is succesful.
        Parameters:
        isCaptureSuccessful - takes in the return value from the function to determine whether to increase/decrease the score.
        holeType - used to know which hole the ball has been capture into
